column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The overall ambiance and vibe of the restaurant is very casual
column2: but more so leaning towards casual formal. With that note
column3: it isn't exactly a spot to go to if you're just going to throw a dart at the map and say
column4: 'Let's go there!' I would say that it is a great spot to go to if you're going on a casual date
column5: or you and a group of friends want to experience something new.
